entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Westlock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:34 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
